parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Dative Feminine Singular
str2: Of what sort. From the base of pou and hoios; individualizing interrogative what sort of, or which one.
From exesti; privilege, i.e. force, capacity, competency, freedom, or mastery, delegated influence.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From exesti; privilege, i.e. force, capacity, competency, freedom, or mastery, delegated influence.
